item.title: [Machine Learning] Basic Math for ML with Python (Part 1)
item.author: Youhee
item.description: Machine learning is nothing but a geometry problem ! All data is the same. Understanding geometry is very important to solve machine learning problems. [Numpy] Basic Linear Algebra Linear algebra, mathematical discipline that deals with vectors and matrices and, more generally, with vector spaces and linear transformations (Britannica) In this lecture, you will learn Scala, Vector, Array, Tensor Dot product & Norm Multiplication & Transpose & Invertible matrix Linear Transformation Eigen Value & Eigen Vector Cosine Similarity and perform these with Numpy

item.title: [Udacity] MLOps
item.author: Youhee
item.description: Udacity Program MLOps I participated Machine Learning DevOps Engineer program in Udacity (Certification). The program was extraordinary great, providing handful hands-on projects with the detailed and accurate human feedback. MLOps was whole different world and opened my eyes to the world of DevOps and machine learning in production level. The program is consisted of four projects, and each project covered different technology skills and tools. The most important thing the program emphasized was clean code principes, such as refactoring, handling errors, unit-testing, logging, and addressing.
